name: Les Évadés

name: The Dark Knight : Le Chevalier noir

actors: Christopher Nolan, Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine,

name: Inception

name: Fight Club

name: Forrest Gump

actors: Robert Zemeckis, Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field,

actors: David Yates, Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Brendan Gleeson,

resume: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.
actors: Michael Curtiz, Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains,

name: Rocky
resume: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

resume: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

resume: April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.
